assessments.status_rationale: No CPI print reported; BLS November CPI is expected around Dec 11–12 and the deadline has not arrived.
No Core CPI figure in today’s coverage; the release is due next week ahead of the Dec 12 deadline.
No University of Michigan final December sentiment reported; final print typically posts closer to Dec 20.
No FOMC SEP details in the news; the December meeting and projections are expected later this week before the deadline.
No OFAC press release on DPRK designations in today’s bullets; still before the year-end deadline.
No report of a new European Commission DSA proceeding; deadline remains year-end.
No NOAA SWPC report of an X1.0+ flare in the provided news; cannot confirm without explicit evidence.
No confirmation of a WTI front-month settle at or below $72; no commodity settlement data cited.
No Mozilla Critical advisory noted for December 2025 in the news items; month is ongoing.
No CISA ICS advisory with CVSS ≥9.8 referenced; December advisories may still post later in the month.
